sentences.sContent: We show this in a scene in the Sistine Chapel [in Rome] where we create a big crack in the fresco of God and Adam.
sentences.sContent_eng: We show this in a scene in the Sistine Chapel [in Rome] where we create a big crack in the fresco of God and Adam.
sentences.sCn: 我们将这个观点放到了发生在罗马西斯廷教堂的一幕里——一幅绘有上帝与亚当的壁画发生严重断裂。

remMethod.val: fres(看做fresh， 新鲜的) + co(看做cool， 凉爽的) → 壁画的清新画面让人仿佛感受到了迎面而来的凉爽新鲜的气息 → 湿壁画

trans.tranOther: a painting made on a wall while the  plaster  is still wet
